title: Shoe Ninja Shoe Deodorizer - Shoe Odour Eliminator with Activated Charcoal, Versatile and Reusable Deodoriser Bags for Shoes, Football Boot Deodoriser and Shoe Smell Remover, Great for Sports - 2 Pack
features: POWERFUL SHOE ODOUR ELIMINATOR: Shoe Ninja shoe deodorisers use activated charcoal to absorb moisture and odours. Perfect for shoes, gym bags, and home, our shoe freshener & deodoriser eliminates stink for good.
FRESH AND LONG-LASTING: Available in ocean and citrus scents, Shoe Ninja lasts up to a year. From football boots to trainers, it’s a reliable football boot deodoriser and shoe odour eliminator.
VERSATILE APPLICATIONS: Use Shoe Ninja shoe deodorisers for trainers, gym bags, boxing gloves, and travel essentials. It keeps odours at bay wherever they arise.
NATURAL CHARCOAL: Activated charcoal powers this shoe deodoriser, absorbing odours and moisture. It’s a natural, chemical-free shoe freshener & deodoriser.
SIMPLE AND EASY TO USE: Place the reusable shoe odour eliminator in shoes or bags. Rechargeable in sunlight monthly for up to a year, saving you time and money!

Shoe Ninja Citrus Scent Add To Basket Trash Ninja Add To Basket Fridge Ninja Add To Basket Fridge Ninja Compact Buying Options Customer Reviews 3.9 out of 5 stars 248 3.1 out of 5 stars 304 4.2 out of 5 stars 9,339 4.2 out of 5 stars 9,339 Price £9.99 £ 9 . 99 £8.99 £ 8 . 99 £10.99 £ 10 . 99 £6.99 £ 6 . 99 Filter Type Activated Charcoal Activated Charcoal Activated Charcoal Activated Charcoal Recommended Application Shoes Bins Refrigerator Refrigerator Lasts For One Year Three Months One Year Three Months Rechargeable ✔ ✔ ✔ ✔ Versatile Uses ✔ ✔ ✔ ✔ Do these come charged and how do I recharge these shoe deodorisers? Yes, our shoe fresheners are ready to use. To recharge, simply set our shoe odour eliminators out in direct sun for 2-4 hours every month to keep them working at their best. How long will this shoe freshener work? Our shoe smell removers are good for up to a year, but the fragrance may fade after a few months. Can I use these shoe odour eliminators for something other than shoes? Yes, the applications are endless! You can use it on your smelly football boots, your musty gym back, your stinky laundry basket, and more!
